title: Documentation - PA and AO metrics overview
abstract:
# Documentation - PA and AO metrics overview
Metrics are quantitative measurements taken from the workloads deployed in your Google Distributed Cloud Hosted (GDCH) projects that help you monitor resources.
This section provides information about metrics collected from all components in GDCH and contains information about metric types, duration, and labels for each. Use this document for reference when constructing [PromQL](https://prometheus.io/docs/prometheus/latest/querying/basics/) (Prometheus Query Language) expressions to query metrics in the monitoring instance of your project.
Review information about metrics for the following GDCH components:
- [AddOn Manager (ADD)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/metrics-add) 
- [Backup and Restore (BACK)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/metrics-back) 
- [Database Service (DBS)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/metrics-dbs) 
- [User Clusters (KUB)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/metrics-kub) 
- [Object Storage (OBJ)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/metrics-obj) 
- [Upgrade Orchestrator (UPG)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/metrics-upg) 
- [Virtual Machine Management (VMM)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/metrics-vmm)
content:
## Visualize PA metrics
For information about the monitoring and visualizing processes for the Platform Administrator (PA), see [the monitoring overview](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform/pa-user/monitoring-overview) in the Administrative guide.
Use the following URL to access metrics in the monitoring instance of the `platform-obs` project:
```
https://GDCH_HOST/platform-obs/grafana/explore
```
Replace `` with the name of your organization in GDCH.
## Visualize AO metrics
For information about the monitoring and visualizing processes for the Application Operator (AO), see [the monitoring overview](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/application/ao-user/monitoring-overview) in the Developer's guide.
Use the following URL to access metrics in the monitoring instance of your project:
```
https://GDCH_HOST/PROJECT_NAME/grafana/explore
```
Replace the following:
- ``: the name of your organization in GDCH
- ``: the name of your project
